title: A German Banking Giant Made Big Bets on Uber, Lyft, Beyond Meat, and Slack Stock
text:
Germany’s second-largest bank bought up newly public stocks in the third quarter that had slumped in that period. Most of them have continued to slip in the fourth quarter.

Commerzbank loaded up on Uber Technologies (ticker: UBER), Lyft (LYFT), Beyond Meat (BYND), and Slack Technologies (WORK). The bank disclosed the trades in a form it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission. All except Uber are sporting losses in the nascent fourth quarter, while the S&P 500 is flat for October.

...
description: Commerzbank loaded up on newly public stocks that were slumping in the third quarter. All but Uber have continued to slip in October.
